title: An Act establishing a special commission to investigate and study the feasibility of establishing a municipal building financing authority

abstracts.abstract: By Mr. O'Connor, a petition (accompanied by bill, Senate, No. 2191) of Patrick M. O'Connor, David T. Vieira and Steven George Xiarhos for legislation to establish a special commission to investigate and study the feasibility of establishing a municipal building financing authority.  State Administration and Regulatory Oversight.

actions.description: Referred to the committee on State Administration and Regulatory Oversight

related_entities.name: committee on State Administration and Regulatory Oversight

actions.description: Hearing scheduled for 10/29/2025 from 10:30 AM-01:00 PM in A-2

Bill reported favorably by committee and referred to the committee on Rules of the two branches, acting concurrently
